contexts: As a child of a tr element.
tag_omission:
A td element's end tag can be omitted if the
  td element is immediately followed by a td or th element,
  or if there is no more content in the parent element.
content_attributes: colspan —  Number of columns that the cell is to span
rowspan —  Number of rows that the cell is to span
headers —  The header cells for this cell
